title: Announcement, David Carson Lecture, 1993
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, right edge, center, running downward, sideways: THE/ RAW/ AND the/ COOKED/ --DESIGN,/ lettering, TYPEFACE, &/ RAYGUN PARTS: Edward Fella
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper half of sheet, center: DAVVVIIIDD/ CARSON/ OF Ray GUN/ SURFER/ BEACH/ CULTURE/ MAGAZINE; running upward, sideways: GRAOHIC DESIGNER:/ AND/ ART DIRECTOR; across lower third of sheet: CALARTS GRAPHIC/ DESIGN PROGRAM SPRING/ 1993 SLIDE LECTURE/ SERIES THURSDAY/ AT 10:30 A.M.ON APRIL 15/ IN THE BIJ O U THEATER
Verso: Across upper third of sheet: DAVID CARSON:/ GRAPHIC DESIGNER/* ART/ DIRECTOR OF RAYGUN,/ SURFER, AND BEACH/ CULTURE MAGAZINE; across lower left quadrant: California/ INSTITUTE/ OF/ ARTS/ 24700/ McBEAN/ VALENCIA,/ CA91355
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black, for lecture by David Carson, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles, throughout. 
Recto: Across upper half of sheet, center, text, highly abstracted, giving title, biographical information, bound by broken line.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving location, time, date, additional information.  
Verso: Across upper third of sheet, text giving lecturor's name, biographical information.  Across center third of sheet, series of scattered abstract shapes and objects, including bird-like figures and tools.  Across lower left quadrant, return address.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, David Carson Lecture, 1993. Offset lithograph on cream paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-6
